context.p: After DNS is setup correctly, Eucalyptus will automatically create DNS entries when you create or delete buckets. The DNS service embedded in the CLC will respond with the Walrus IP when a DNS request is made for <bucketname>.walrus.<subdomain>.
In addition, instance IPs will be mapped as euca-A.B.C.D.eucalyptus.<subdomain>, where A.B.C.D is the IP address (or addresses) assigned to your instance.
